title: Ruins of Chaos
description: Aria’s in the hands of her enemies, and things are going from bad to worse. Those who she thought were allies have become enemies, and enemies have become allies. On top of that, Knox’s history is unraveling, and it might just be Aria’s undoing.Will they overcome what was done to the Nine Realms? Or will the truth destroy them both?Aria’s plans are all coming apart and with everything on the line, how far will Aria go to protect those she loves from Knox’s anger?
author: Amelia Hutchins
